Query:
Resource name: [some_resource]
Resource group name: [some_resource_group]
Selector: | where ((name =~ 'some_resource') and (resourceGroup =~ 'some_resource_group'))

Recommendation.LongDescription: This test recommendation is used by unit tests defined in /tests/runbook/runbook.tests.ps1.
Recommendation.Query:
Resource name: [{{resource_name}}]
Resource group name: [{{resource_group_name}}]
Selector: \\ selector
